German[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /moˈmɛnt/
  • Rhymes: -ɛnt

Etymology 1[edit]

Noun[edit]

Moment m (genitive Moments or Momentes, plural Momente, diminutive Momentchen n)

  1. moment
    Synonym: Augenblick

Etymology 2[edit]

Noun[edit]

Moment n (genitive Moments or Momentes, plural Momente)

  1. (physics) momentum
